task_15.description: Lift the red tissue and place it on top of the green cup
task_15.initial_setup: The red tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the far left corner. The green paper cup is upright on the center of the table, 10 cm from the edge. A blue plastic cup is tilted and resting on its side near the right side.
task_15.final_state: The red tissue is flat and placed directly on top of the green cup. The blue cup is upright on the far right corner.
